CustomField.description: Checks if Opp Stage value meets basic DSLR rollup criteria.
CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( npsp__Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Planned_Gift', npsp__Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'InKindGift', OR( ISPICKVAL(npsp__Opportunity__r.StageName, 'Received as Conditional Pledge'), ISPICKVAL(npsp__Opportunity__r.StageName, 'Received'), ISPICKVAL (npsp__Opportunity__r.StageName, 'Received as Unconditional Pledge') )
), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.label: Sys-DLRS Stage/Rec Type Check
